21  from imusim.utilities.documentation import prepend_method_doc 
22  from abc import ABCMeta, abstractmethod 
23  from copy import copy 

24   
25 -class Integrator(object): 

26      """ 
27      Base class for integrators. 
28      """ 
29      __metaclass__ = ABCMeta 
30   

31 -    def __init__(self, initialValue): 

32          """ 
33          Initialise integrator. 
34   
35          @param initialValue: Initial value for integral. 
36          """ 
37          self._accumulator = copy(initialValue) 

38   
39      @abstractmethod 

40 -    def __call__(self, sampleValue, dt): 

41          """ 
42          Update the integral with a new sample value and time step. 
43   
44          @return: The updated integral value. 
45          """ 
46          pass 

47   

48 -class RectangleRule(Integrator): 

49      """ 
50      Integration by the rectangle rule. 
51      """ 
52   

53 -    def __call__(self, sampleValue, dt): 

54          self._accumulator += sampleValue * dt 
55          return copy(self._accumulator) 

56   

57 -class TrapeziumRule(Integrator): 

58      """ 
59      Integration by the trapezium rule. 
60      """ 

61 -    def __init__(self, initialValue): 

62          Integrator.__init__(self, initialValue) 
63          self._previousValue = None 

64   

65 -    def __call__(self, sampleValue, dt): 

66          if self._previousValue is not None: 
67              self._accumulator += dt * (self._previousValue + sampleValue) / 2 
68          else: 
69              self._accumulator += sampleValue * dt 
70          self._previousValue = sampleValue 
71          return copy(self._accumulator) 

72   

73 -class DoubleIntegrator(object): 

74      """ 
75      Iterative integrator that performs double integration. 
76      """ 
77      @prepend_method_doc(Integrator) 

78 -    def __init__(self, initialValue, initialDerivative, method=RectangleRule): 

79          """ 
80          @param initialDerivative: Initial value for derivative of integral. 
81          @param method: L{Integrator} class to use. 
82          """ 
83          self.integrator_1 = method(initialDerivative) 
84          self.integrator_2 = method(initialValue) 

85   

86 -    def __call__(self, sampleValue, dt): 

87          return self.integrator_2(self.integrator_1(sampleValue, dt), dt)
